page.title: 14RELIGION PLEAN & COWIE
page.content:
The Rev. Cullan is the Church of Scotland minister of the church at Plean which is 145 years old and has a membership of 340 and of the Cowie Church which is 80 years old and has 325 members. He lives in the Manse at Plean. There are various organisations associated with the Church: Womens' Guild, Boys Brigade, Guides and Brownies. He is also the school chaplain to Cowie, East Plean, West Plean Primary school and Bannockburn High School.
"As Church of Scotland minister in this parish of about 7000 people I believe it is my duty to try to interest them in the church. I believe God created each one of us and I believe Jesus Christ died for each one of us. I want everyone in this parish to love and to serve God."
